summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6095 for the improvement of 1st Avenue Northwest from West 42nd Street to West 45th Street and, westerly roadway, from West 45th Street to West 47th Street; and certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 84094, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
